infos.value: ...Ahh. That was grueling.
Nothing worth making a fuss over.
Oh, but it is! You are far too trusting of women, Brother!
How many times will it take you being deceived for you to finally come to your senses!?
A knight cannot help but rush in if princesses are in trouble.
As if you're a knight to begin with...
Can I become a knight?
Hahahaha. You would be a princess, not a knight, Chel.
Aaaah!
Someone calls for me.
Another woman...
I have a bad feeling about this...but I can't just stand here.
Hey, what's wrong, Ty Ty? Are you not gonna go help?
Their opponents are tough... Those are Rundall soldiers.
Rundalls? Are they bad?
Yes. They've been waging war on neighboring nations one after another to expand their territory.
...Identify yourselves.
Oh, no, we were just...
Would you look at that—some good men. Something good comes of letting out a scream every now and then.
Please, help us. We were suddenly ambushed by them.
What...!?
If you intend to interfere, then we won't make it easy for you.
Oh, look⁠! The Rundalls are even angrier!
Dammit. Just what I was afraid of.
Please wait a moment, princesses. We shall make quick work of these nuisances.
Make quick work of us...!? Wh-why you...!
Howlie! Ty Ty! Go get 'em!
Right. Leave it to me.
How did we get wrapped up in something like this again?
